epoetics.core

Class Tag_Cloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • epoetics.core.Linguistic_Element
      • epoetics.core.Tag_Cloud
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Tag_Cloud
extends Linguistic_Element
    This class represents a tag cloud containing words which are significant for the linguistic element it is computed from. The class contains methods for computing the ranks of the keywords in the cloud. The class also stores the scores of the keywords in the cloud.
    Author:
    Andreas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      A map from scores to keywords in the cloud which have a particular score.
      (package private) java.lang.Float[] sorted_score_list
      The sorted list of the scores of the keywords in the cloud.
